messages.title: A record of action and a promise of more
messages.content: Over the past 23 years, Menzies Campbell has served the constituency of North East Fife, focusing on key local concerns and representing his constituents.

keyPolicies.policyDescription: Closing loopholes for the wealthy and increasing the threshold for paying income tax to £10,000, benefiting millions.
Creating jobs through environmental investment and achieving a £3.5 billion saving that goes into public transport and energy improvements.

keyPolicies.policyTitle: A fair start for all our children
keyPolicies.policyDescription: Reducing class sizes, investing in education, and ensuring accessibility to good schools without tuition fees.

keyPolicies.policyTitle: Fair, transparent and more local politics
keyPolicies.policyDescription: Improving the political system to focus on local needs and issues, introducing fixed-term parliaments, and enabling voters to sack corrupt politicians.

mentions.tacticalSituation: The leaflet suggests it is a two-horse race between Liberal Democrat Menzies Campbell and a Conservative candidate, implying the Labour or SNP candidates cannot win here.

issues.economy: Liberal Democrats promise to create jobs and put money in people's pockets, while making sure that everyone plays by the same set of rules.
issues.education: A fair start for all our children by cutting class sizes, ensuring a good school place for every child without tuition fees.
issues.environment: A commitment to a fair, green economy with investments to create jobs and sustainable energy options.
issues.governance: Promising fair, transparent and more local politics with reforms such as the introduction of fixed-term parliaments and the ability for constituents to recall their MP.

housing.content: Increased investment in affordable and fair social housing would be sought.

leaflet.personalStatement: Menzies Campbell expresses his dedication to serving the people of North East Fife and his aspiration to continue his work.

politicalExperience.achievements: Has addressed hardworking farmers, fishermen, and small businesses' issues and led campaigns on healthcare and education.

images.caption: Images of Menzies Campbell engaging with constituents and addressing parliament.
